text: Drama Special: My Embarrassing Days (Hangul: 드라마 스페셜 - 나의 흑역사 오답노트) is a South Korean single-episode television drama starring Jeon So-min, Park Sung-hoon, and . It aired on KBS on September 14, 2018, as part of Drama Special, a weekly program on KBS2 showing short dramas (usually single episodes), with each episode having a different story, cast, director, and writer. == Synopsis == A group of math teachers are selected to review an exam. Do Do-Hye and her ex-husband are among the group of teachers. Na Pil-Seung is the security officer assigned to watch over the teachers to prevent them from leaking exam material. Do-Hye and Pil-Seung shared some embarrassing moments during their college days. Do-hye tries her best to avoid these embarrassing memories. == Cast == * Jeon So-min as Do Do-hye * Park Sung-hoon as Na Pil-seung * as Choi Jin-sang * as Teacher Oh == Awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable" ! Year ! Award ! Category ! Nominee ! title: Review Notebook of My Embarrassing Days
